column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Had a problem with Jinya and I was contacted by their owner about it not to remove the review
column2: not even to defend themselves or bash me
column3: but to genuinely tell me that they read my complaint and wanted to fix it. I value service way more than quality of food to be honest
column4: and this is definitely a place that values their service and I appreciate that. I've actually never had bad service here
column5: even on the night that I didn't have the most positive experience. I will be back sometime in the future to give this place another shot
column6: as they do value their customers' experience and see if I can finally find THE RAMEN.
